page.title: 08FUND RAISING AT HAXEY SCHOOL
page.content: On Saturday we had a fun afternoon that the P.T.A organised.The P.T.A have organised a few fund raising events in the last few years and they have a fun afternoon each year. The P.T.A have bought a lot of things for school including a sewing machine,a computer,two disc drives,software, V.D.U,computer trolley,football kit, netball kit,jumping pit,bench, and bigtrack. The fun afternoon started at 2.00pm and finished at 4.00pm. At the fun afternoon were pet shows,fancy dress, horse riding,bouncy castle,tombola, raffle,and other sorts of games.There were also some drinks and crisps.My mum and dad did the horse riding and sometimes I helped them.A lot of people went to the fun afternoon and enjoyed themselves.The most popular
